General.Name: Gansu Yasheng Industrial Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Yasheng Industrial (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, processing, and sale of agricultural products in China. The company offers hops, forage grass, potatoes, corn seeds, fruits, sunflower, pepper, spices, and other agricultural products. It also provides agricultural drip and water-saving irrigation equipment, and other industrial products. In addition, the company engages in crop planting, agricultural product processing, agricultural technology research and development, agricultural material services, and business circulation, as well as real estate brokerage business. Gansu Yasheng Industrial (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Jinlong  Fu
3.Title: Deputy Mang. of Internal Control & Auditing Department of HQ and Member of Supervisory Board
